name: Head in the News
description:
We suggest the following roles when playing the game:

There are two news outlets, the Transalpine Time and U-News, the first is a reputable newspaper focusing on the quality of their publications, while U-News is an upbeat infotainement channel which can publish more popular content in order to earn more.

Gogol, the search engine, should mostly be preoccupied with answering the questions with relevant headlines (the one that are relevant to the topic of the week), i.e. having them on top.

Team

Tâm Nguyên, Lúcás Meier, Beiqian Qi, Emma Mozer, 

WARNING: all headlines are fictitious and at no point is this game a reliable source of informations about the SARS-Cov2 virus, Covid19 disease, or the pandemic as a whole. The game only aims to illustrate how recommender system in the wake of the pandemics can acts as echo chamber when the drive behind publicized content is popularity.
